detail_desc: Shirt in a cotton weave with a button-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved top and a pair of leggings in soft organic cotton jersey. Top with a press-stud on one shoulder. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Jumper in a fine-knit cotton blend with a hood with a wrapover front and ribbed cuffs.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Relaxed fit with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist and ribbed hems.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves, buttons down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Top in a soft, fine-knit modal and cotton blend with a ribbed stand-up collar, zip at the top, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover, jersey-lined hood, long sleeves, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Slipper boots in soft, fluffy faux fur with appliqués. Faux fur linings and insoles, and sturdy, fluted soles.
Short, 5-pocket, low-rise shorts in washed denim with hard-worn details in a slightly looser fit with a zip fly and button and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Padded bomber jacket in woven fabric with a small, ribbed stand-up collar and zip down the front. Flap front pockets with a press-stud, a zipped sleeve pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Visible, gathered seam down the sleeves and back. Lined.
Chunky-knit jumper in a soft wool and mohair blend with a stand-up collar, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Sweatpants in soft sweatshirt fabric. Casual style in a relaxed fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets, a fake back pocket and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Short T-shirt dress in soft jersey with short cap sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Boxer shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated waist, long legs and button fly.
5-pocket trousers in washed, slightly stretchy twill with a regular waist, zip fly and skinny legs. Skinny fit.
Push-up bra in lace and mesh with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Jacket in washed cotton denim with a collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Leggings in heavy, organic cotton jersey with glittery details and a soft brushed inside. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist.
Fully lined sports bralette in fast-drying functional fabric. Narrow cut at the top and a racer back.
Treggings in stretch twill made from a cotton blend with an elasticated waist, fake fly and fake front pockets.
Short-sleeved top in soft viscose jersey with embroidery. at the top. Gathers in the sides for best fit.
Long-sleeved dress in a patterned crêpe weave with a small stand-up collar and zip at the back, Elasticated seam and a flounce at the waist. Unlined.
Shorts in a patterned organic cotton weave with an elasticated waist, side pockets and welt back pockets.
Vest tops in soft, printed cotton jersey.

Short dress in soft jersey with a unique nursing feature. Double-layered with a short, wide top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric. Long raglan sleeves. Can be used both during pregnancy and when nursing afterwards. The design includes a double layer to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
Long-sleeved, off-the-shoulder jersey top with a double frill in woven fabric and narrow elastication at the top.
Running vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with a gently rounded hem.

Weekend bag in imitation suede with a detachable, adjustable fabric shoulder strap, two handles and a zip at the top, and studs on the bottom. Three inner compartments. Lined. Size approx. 22x31x48 cm.
Bikini top with a lined, shaped front, wide shoulder straps and wide elastication at the hem. Wide metal fastening at the back.
Patterned swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Soft mesh inner shorts.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey with press-studs down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Pyjamas with a top and leggings in soft cotton jersey with a print motif. Short-sleeved top. Leggings with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Purse with a zip around three sides. Four card compartments, one note compartment and a small, zipped coin compartment. Size 2x10x11.5 cm.
Fitted top in soft, organic cotton jersey with a round neckline and long puff sleeves. Gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Long-sleeved top in stretch jersey with a V-neck. Lace trim around the neckline and down the front.
Short, 5-pocket skirt in washed, stretch denim with a zip fly and button. The skirt is made partly from recycled cotton.
Trainers in mesh with imitation leather details and lacing at the front. Mesh linings, fabric insoles and fluted ethylene-vinyl acetate (EVA) and thermoplastic (TPR) rubber soles.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and a lined front.
V-neck cardigan in a soft jacquard knit with buttons down the front, long sleeves and pockets in the side seams.
High-waisted jeggings in stretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

Checked shirt in soft cotton flannel with a turn-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves and cuffs with adjustable fasteners, a yoke with a box pleat at the back and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Alice band with an appliqué decoration on top.

Short dress in airy chiffon made from patterned, recycled polyester with a sweetheart neckline and flounces down the front. Open section with lacing at the back and long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs and flounces down the sides. Elasticated seam at the waist and flounces at the hem. Partly lined in jersey. The lining is made from recycled polyester.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine cotton knit with a motif on the front, slits in the sides and ribbing at the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Spotted mesh cap with an inner terry sweatband and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Hi-tops with lacing at the front, a hook and loop tab at the top and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with a fluffy finish. Motif on the front, long sleeves and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Fancy dress all-in-one suit in soft pile with a zip down the front and hood with sewn-on ears and appliqués. Narrow ribbing at the cuffs and hems, and a detachable tail with a hook and loop fastening.
Blouse in a soft weave with a narrow collar, concealed buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with long puff sleeves and wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Strapless balconette bras in lace with underwired, padded cups that lift and shape. Silicone trim at the top of the back and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.
Trainers in cotton canvas with elastic gores in the sides, a padded edge and a small loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Bell-shaped skirt in a fine-knit viscose blend with an elasticated waist.

Short, fitted dress in woven fabric with short cap sleeves and a concealed zip at the back with a safety button at the top. Seam at the waist and a slightly stretchy skirt with a slit at the back. Lined.
Jacket in a patterned rustle weave with a stand-up collar and detachable hood with an elasticated edge. Zip down the front with a chin guard, and elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.

5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs. Shaping – denim with a stretch function that holds in and shapes the waist, thighs and bum while keeping the jeans in shape.
Fully lined V-neck swimsuit with narrow shoulder straps attached to a decorative metal ring at the back, low-cut back and high-cut legs.
Short dress in linen slub jersey with a round neck, narrow elastication with gathers and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Tie in print-patterned satin. Width 7 cm.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.

Shirt in Tencel™ lyocell with a turn-down collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a welt back pocket.
Short coat in a sturdy wool blend with a concealed zip and wind flap down the front and flap front pockets. Lined.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a rounded, woven collar, an opening with a button at the back of the neck, and narrow ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Trim at the hem in a cotton weave.

Set with a T-shirt in cotton jersey and a pair of dungarees in lightweight sweatshirt fabric. T-shirt with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y). Dungarees with elastication at the back of the waist, straps with adjustable fasteners at the front, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a high waist, wide sides, high-cut legs and high cut at the back.
Pyjamas in patterned jersey made from a cotton blend. Short-sleeved top with a round neckline. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and wide, gently tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Padded gilet with a detachable, lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, and welt side pockets. Lined.
Fully lined printed swimsuit.
Shirt in soft, checked cotton flannel with a turn-down collar, classic front, two open chest pockets, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Short, boxy-style jacket in washed denim with a collar, buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Flap chest pockets with a button and side pockets.
Jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, a chest pocket and welt front pockets with a flap. Buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined.
Ankle-length trousers in a slightly stretchy weave with a fake fly, side pockets and a fake back pocket. Wide ribbing at the waist for optimum comfort.
Slightly shorter-style jumper knitted in a cotton blend with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with an extra-high waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Hat in a soft rib knit containing some mohair.
Sleeveless top in a crinkled viscose weave in a narrow cut with gathers at the top and short, narrow shoulder straps. Lace trim around the armholes.
Straight-cut jacket in sturdy jersey with notch lapels, buttons at the front and patch front pockets. Unlined.
Long skirt in pleated, heavily draping satin. High waist with covered elastication at the back and a concealed zip in one side. Lined.

Small shoulder bag in shimmering metallic imitation leather with glittery appliqués at the top. Flap with embroidery, a small knob and concealed hook and loop fastening. Fabric shoulder strap with a button at one side. Lined. Size 3x7.5x10.5 cm.
